Module.Content: <bgcolor="silver"> <FORM> <center><INPUT type="button" value="Add Quotes" onClick="window.open('https://sites.google.com/site/fjampages/add-quotes-to-messages','mywindow','width=800,height=400')"> <INPUT type="button" value="Smilies Page 1" onClick="window.open('http://tinyurl.com/bozdj5d','mywindow','width=250,height=600,scrollbars=yes')"> <INPUT type="button" value="Smilies Page 2" onClick="window.open('http://tinyurl.com/cobw4vl','mywindow','width=250,height=600,scrollbars=yes')"> <INPUT type="button" value="Smilies Page 3" onClick="window.open('http://tinyurl.com/bqq9z94','mywindow','width=250,height=600,scrollbars=yes')"> <INPUT type="button" value="Smilies Page 4" onClick="window.open('http://tinyurl.com/bfb82xo','mywindow','width=250,height=600,scrollbars=yes')"></center> </FORM>
